summary: Test module that validates the behavior of the Prefect server scheduling service, focusing on the recent deployments scheduler and schedule generation logic. It checks that only deployments with active schedules are processed, runs are created for new or recently updated deployments, stale deployments are ignored, loop timing defaults are respected, schedule creation adheres to a maximum future horizon, batch insertion respects configured sizes, and paused states prevent run creation.
business_intent: Guarantee that the scheduling component of the Prefect platform operates correctly and safely, honoring configuration limits and deployment schedule states to avoid unintended or duplicate workflow runs.
